about_the_game:
Save space effortlessly with cutting-edge AI file compression!


CompressorX is a game-changing compression layer for the Windows File System that harnesses the power of a specially trained AI model to deliver lossless, transparent data compression for your files.

  • Transparent compression: Compressed files can still be used normally - open, edit, and save them like any other file. CompressorX works its magic behind the scenes.
  • Reclaim gigabytes of storage: Perfect for large games, development, video projects, photo collections, and any situation with many loose files. CompressorX ensures you're saving substantial disk space.
  • Cutting-edge AI compression: Our proprietary AI model intelligently compresses data, optimizing compression ratios while preserving perfect fidelity.
  • Lightning fast and light on resources: CompressorX runs smoothly in the background, with minimal CPU and RAM usage. You won't even notice it's there!
  • Set it and forget it: Select the folders you want to compress, and CompressorX does the rest. New files added are compressed automatically.
  • Auto-import apps, games, and software: CompressorX can automatically detect and import installed applications, games, and software for easy compression.
  • One-click compression for project files: Quickly locate and compress project files for various software like Photoshop, Blender, Unity, and more with a single click.
  • No file modification: CompressorX integrates directly with Windows, ensuring that files are reduced in size without changing their contents. Your files remain intact and fully compatible with their original applications.

Take control of your disk space and streamline your storage with CompressorX, the smartest compression utility on the market. Powered by advanced AI, CompressorX delivers unbeatable compression performance while keeping your files fully accessible.

CompressorX is a game-changing compression layer for the Windows File System that harnesses the power of a specially trained AI model to deliver lossless, transparent data compression for your files.

  • Transparent compression: Compressed files can still be used normally - open, edit, and save them like any other file. CompressorX works its magic behind the scenes.

  • One-click compression for project files: Quickly locate and compress project files for various software like Photoshop, Blender, Unity, and more with a single click.
  • No file modification: CompressorX integrates directly with Windows, ensuring that files are reduced in size without changing their contents. Your files remain intact and fully compatible with their original applications.

name: CompressorX

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Any modern x64 CPU with support for hardware acceleration
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any GPU with AI Acceleration
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires Microsoft Edge WebView2
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: CompressorX is an AI-powered file compression utility for Windows that saves space by transparently compressing files, apps, games, and project files. Set it and forget it, or compress with just one click.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
